#sidebar ServerAPI

= Dashboard Statistics API =

http://code.google.com/p/xe-core/issues/detail?id=2740

== Unique Visitor API ==

{{{
var params = {};

jQuery.exec_json("counter.getWeeklyUniqueVisitor", params, function(retObj){
    console.log(retObj);
});
}}}

위와 같이 호출 하면 아래와 같은 형태로 리턴 됨.

{{{
Array
(
    [error] => 0
    [message] => success
    [last_week] => Array
        (
            [list] => Array
                (
                    ['20121216'] => 0
                    ['20121217'] => 1
                    ['20121218'] => 1
                    ['20121219'] => 0
                    ['20121220'] => 1
                    ['20121221'] => 0
                    ['20121222'] => 0
                )
            [max] => 1
            [sum] => 3
        )
    [this_week] => Array
        (
            [list] => Array
                (
                    ['20121216'] => 0
                    ['20121217'] => 1
                    ['20121218'] => 1
                    ['20121219'] => 0
                    ['20121220'] => 1
                    ['20121221'] => 0
                    ['20121222'] => 0
                )
            [max] => 1

        )
)
}}}
